txt.en: You have selected Gladdy as your favourite to win
The race has begun! Betting is now closed
Gladdy has won the race!
You have a vested interest in Gladdy's success as she runs the Summer Festival tasting race.
Gladdy has lost the race
Gladdy has lost the race
Gladdy has lost the race
You have left the race area

'Good day to you, my good [placeholder]! Are you here to watch the Taste of Hobbiton? It is a tremendously exciting event that we hold here every summer. Food is brought from all over the Shire, and our four speedy contestants must compete to see how quickly they can sample each bit of vittles!

'Here is a bit of inside information, if you'll be wanting it: Gladdy Chubb-Baggins is actually my favourite this year. Her mother told me in confidence that Gladdy never stops eating for more than a few minutes at a time -- that her appetite is fathomless! Yet she is as spritely as a spring in springtime, wouldn't you say?

'Yes, I am fully convinced that she is a sure thing. Would you like to place your faith in her winning the event? I am sure there will be a great prize in it for you if you guess rightly.'
Tickets for the race can be collected at the Taste of Hobbiton event during the Summer Festival.\n\nYou will need to hand over a Festival Ticket in order to select Gladdy as your favourite to win.
'Well done, [placeholder]! I hear you had some excellent luck with your guess at the outcome of the Taste of Hobbiton. Allow me to offer my congratulations and this respectable reward!'
The Taste of Hobbiton can be observed during the Summer Festival.\n\nYou should watch the Taste of Hobbiton and see if Gladdy Chubb-Baggins wins the race as you supposed.
Bando Brandybuck can be found at the Taste of Hobbiton.\n\nYou should speak with Bando Brandybuck to collect your prize.
'My goodness! Watch the race, [placeholder]; it is far more interesting than me. Gladdy will do splendidly, I am sure!'
'Gladdy is your favourite is she? Well then, hand me one of your Festival Tickets, and I'll mark your wager on her.\n\n'Good luck, [placeholder]!'
'Sorry, [placeholder]. I'm afraid you'll need a Festival Ticket in order to select a contestant.\n\n'Dodder Twofoot is handing out tickets just near here. I'd go see him right away!'
Turn in a Festival Ticket to select Gladdy
Observe the race to see if Gladdy is victorious
Talk to Dodder Bando Brandybuck
Do not leave the race area
The Taste of Hobbiton: Gladdy's Gait
